ctx: intros [Hcomm [Hgroup [Hintern [Hassoc Hdist]]]] x y Hx Hy.
exceptions.exn: In environment H : forall (S : Set) (G : S -> Prop) (Add : S -> S -> S) (O : S) (Opp : S -> S), is_group S G Add O Opp -> forall x y : S, is_opposite S G Add O x y -> y = Opp x S : Set A : S -> Prop Add, Mult : S -> S -> S O, I : S Opp : S -> S Hcomm : commutativity S Add Hintern : intern S A Mult Hassoc : associativity S Mult Hdist : distributivity S Add Mult x, y : S Hx : A x Hy : A y H0 : nat H1 : intern S A Add H3 : associativity S Add H5 : opposite S A Add O Opp H4 : A O H2 : forall x : S, A x -> Add O x = x H6 : forall x : S, A x -> Add x O = x Unable to unify "intern S A Mult" with "Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) (fun _ : nat => Mult (Opp x) y = Opp (Mult x y))".

ctx: intros [Hcomm [Hgroup [Hintern [Hassoc Hdist]]]] x y Hx Hy.

ctx: intros [Hcomm [Hgroup [Hintern [Hassoc Hdist]]]] x y Hx Hy.

original: intros [Hcomm [Hgroup [Hintern [Hassoc Hdist]]]] x y Hx Hy. apply opp_unicity; auto. apply Hgroup. - apply Hintern; auto. - econstructor. + apply Hintern; auto. + intros z Hz. assert (Add (Mult x y) z = O). { rewrite <- (neutral _ _ _ I _ _ Hgroup). symmetry. rewrite <- Hdist. rewrite mult_opp_r; auto. apply commutativity. apply commutativity. apply Hcomm. apply Hintern. auto. auto. } apply regular_l with (A := A); auto. rewrite mult_opp_r; auto. rewrite commutativity; auto. apply commutativity. apply Hcomm.
